text:
How to find the rule of a arithmetic sequence given two values in the sequence

\begin{aligned}\n&\begin{array}{c}\na_{7}=8, a_{13}=6 \\\n\frac{8}{8} \\\na_{n}=a_{1}+(n-1) d\n\end{array}\\\n&x\n\end{aligned}[imath]a_{7}=8, a_{13}=6 [/imath] [imath]\frac{8}{8} [/imath] [imath]a_{n}=a_{1}+(n-1) d[/imath]
